meanings.definition: Cause (someone) to lose determination or confidence.
meanings.sent1: Seeing his failed experiment disheartens him.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's refusal to learn new tricks disheartens its owner.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds looming overhead dishearten the picnic attendees.
meanings.sent5: The constant criticism from his boss disheartens him every day.

meanings.sent1: She easily disheartens when faced with challenges.
meanings.sent2: Students dishearten after receiving low grades.
meanings.sent3: The video game character disheartens when it keeps losing lives.
meanings.sent4: The wilting flowers in the garden dishearten the gardener.
meanings.sent5: The athlete disheartens after a series of losses in competitions.
